sql.name: SQL_SELECT_ADDRESS_BY_CUSTOMERID
sql.value: select t1.address_id, t1.province, t1.city, t1.district, t1.county, t1.town, t1.detail, t1.zip_code, t1.actor_id, t1.company, t1.create_date, t2.real_name, t2.cell_phone from address t1 left join actor t2 on t1.actor_id = t2.actor_id left join account t3 on t2.customer_id = t3.customer_id where t3.customer_id = ?

sql.name: SQL_SELECT_ADDRESS_BY_ADDRESSID
sql.value: select t1.address_id, t1.province, t1.city, t1.district, t1.county, t1.town, t1.detail, t1.zip_code, t1.actor_id, t1.company, t1.create_date, t2.real_name, t2.cell_phone from address t1 left join actor t2 on t1.actor_id = t2.actor_id left join account t3 on t2.customer_id = t3.customer_id where t3.customer_id = ? and t1.address_id = ?

sql.name: SQL_DELETE_ADDRESS_BY_ADDRESSID
sql.value: delete address from address t1 left join actor t2 on t1.actor_id = t2.actor_id left join account t3 on t2.customer_id = t3.customer_id where t3.customer_id = ? and t1.address_id = ?

sql.name: SQL_INSERT_ADDRESS
sql.value: insert into address(province, city, district, county, town, detail, zip_code, actor_id, company, create_date) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
